description: Fixed Linting Issues Identified by flake8
details: Ran flake8 on the codebase to identify linting issues
Fixed bare except clauses in websocket.py and text.py
Fixed unused imports in audio.py, hotkeys.py, text.py, and __init__.py
Fixed module level import not at top of file in __init__.py
Fixed line too long issues in terminal.py and text.py
Updated version and timestamp in all modified files
Updated Memory Bank documentation with linting progress
